title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 348.7 - Billing for costs and expenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 348.7 - Billing for costs and expenses

State Regulations

Billings for extraordinary reinspection services shall be
itemized and certified in accordance with section
38-a
of the Agriculture and Markets Law and
shall be mailed to the establishment by certified or registered mail. All such
billings shall contain a written notice of the establishment's right to demand
a hearing within 30 days. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
348.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
